title: Stimulant Intoxication
description: A comprehensive guide to Stimulant Intoxication, including diagnosis, management, and clinical considerations based on DSM-5 criteria.
publicSummary: Stimulant Intoxication is a mental health condition classified in the DSM-5 under Substance-Related and Addictive Disorders. This content provides educational information based on current clinical guidelines and is not a substitute for professional medical advice.
